cause.description:
WHAT IS GREEN? GREEN Because You Can is a cause by the people and for the people, dedicated to creating an open form of communication regarding environmental issues.
WHY JOIN THE "GREEN" CAUSE? Help educate each other by sharing beneficial solutions, ideas, links, posts, thoughts, etc. This is an open platform for discussion. The more we share, the more we know.
WHAT IS GREEN'S MOTTO? "Because You Can"
WHERE DO THE DONATIONS GO? http://codetry.com/beneficiaries/39 http://www.environmentaldefense.org/home.cfm
HOW CAN YOU HELP? - Join the GREEN cause - Invite all your friends - Post beneficial solutions on wall - Keep GREEN in profile
FINAL MESSAGE TO EVERYONE: Join this cause and let everyone see the GREEN logo!
1. REDUCE consumption of raw materials
2. REUSE as a seed-starter greenhouse
3. RECYCLE and save energy
4. EDUCATE each other on green ways
cause.name: GREEN
